Detailed Description

Reading and writing of BED files.

See http://genome.ucsc.edu/goldenPath/help/customTrack.html

Function Documentation

void gff_print_bed (  FILE *    OUTF,
GFF_Set *    gff,
char *    groupby,
List *    include
) 
 

Write a GFF_Set in BED format.

Parameters:
OUTF  output stream
gff  Set to write
groupby  Group features according to this tag. All members of a group will be reported on a single line. Use NULL to supress grouping.
include  Only write features of the specified types (list of String objects). If NULL, all features will be written.
